title: [Large-scale] ICT-Based Mathematics Training to Strengthen Geometric Thinking and Higher-Order Cognitive Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Geometric Concepts and Fundamental Mobile Device Skills
context.additional_context: Practical geometric thinking training course for corporate managers/leaders applicable to workplace problem-solving

learning_goals: Students can analyze the volume and surface area of spatial figures and develop problem-solving strategies using ICT tools (such as 3D modeling apps).
Students enhance analytical, evaluative, and creative application skills by solving realistic-context mathematics problems (RME).
Students can collaborate with peer leaders to interpret complex geometric problems and perform data-driven decision-making.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
